content: **crocheted decorative flower in drops muskat theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern r-833 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** 9 cm in diameter **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 12 red / 87 pomegranate / 41 bordeaux 50 g colour 90 moss green 1 flower weighs approx 15 g **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **accesories** wadding or yarn left-overs to fill silk ribbon for loop **crochet gauge ** 22 double crochets in width and 22 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
